content.heading: <title> Tag
paragraphs: The <title> tag defines the document's title.

Example: HTML Elements Reference

This is a heading

This is a paragraph.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Required in HTML, shown in browser title bar or tab.
Critical for SEO, used by search engines for ranking.
Used in browser toolbar, favorites, and search results.
Tips: Use descriptive titles (50-60 characters), avoid keyword lists.
